Function reference

Database tools

Functions to download and import FORCIS database and to get version information

download_forcis_db()
Download the entire FORCIS database
get_available_versions()
Retrieve all versions of a Zenodo repository
get_current_version()
Get the version of the database currently used
get_version_info()
Print information of a specific version of a Zenodo repository
read_cpr_north_data() read_cpr_south_data() read_plankton_nets_data() read_pump_data() read_sediment_trap_data()
Read FORCIS data

Select and filters tools

Function to select and filter FORCIS data

select_columns()
Select columns in FORCIS data
select_taxonomy()
Select a taxonomy in FORCIS data
filter_by_species()
Filter FORCIS data by species
filter_by_month()
Filter FORCIS data by month of sampling
filter_by_year()
Filter FORCIS data by year of sampling
filter_by_bbox()
Filter FORCIS data by a spatial bounding box
filter_by_ocean()
Filter FORCIS data by ocean
filter_by_polygon()
Filter FORCIS data by a spatial polygon

Standardization functions

Functions to homogenize, compute, and aggregate FORCIS data

compute_abundances() compute_concentrations() compute_frequencies()
Compute count conversions

Visualization tools

Functions to visualize FORCIS data

geom_basemap()
Add a World basemap to a ggplot object
map_distribution()
Plot a distribution map of FORCIS data

Utilities

Helper functions

data_to_sf()
Convert a data frame into an sf object
get_ocean_names()
Get World ocean names
get_required_columns()
Get required column names
get_species_names()
Get species names from column names
reshape_data()
Reshape and simplify FORCIS data

On this page
